resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

fields.summary: [ATSv2] NPE while checking for entity acl in non-secure cluster

comments.body: In non-secure cluster, incoming UGI will be null if we don't use static-web-app-filter. In such cases,Â  ugi need to be validated against null and return true.
Attached the simple patch. [~sunil.govind@gmail.com] could you take a look at patch please?
